entry.title: Creating This Site :D
entry.content:
After much debating I have decided to make a website. This site is built on the Jekyll Lanyon theme, you can find the template here.

The bugs

  • After an hour of playing around with fontawesome I finally got icons (but they aren’t animiated sadly)
  • I didn’t like the blog being on the homepage so I moved it to a “blog” page. To my surprise after doing this for each blog post it would add a new link to the side bar navigation. That was rather annoying to try to fix…
  • I tried to crop my profile picture to be circular. After searching around to do this in HTML I coudn’t find anything (i.e. I found how to do it but didn’t want to do it that way). So I did what any sane person would have started with and just cropped the image using this site.
  • Turns out __ doesn’t do italics but this _ does :\
  • Still need to add the papers I’ve read hehe
  • I also need to upgrade my favicon, it’s a little basic and I used this site to create it.
  • I’m sure there is more somewhere…

ʘ‿ʘ
